titles.title: A bill to prohibit land management modifications relating to the Lesser Prairie Chicken.
A bill to prohibit land management modifications relating to the Lesser Prairie Chicken.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) or the Secretary of the Interior from implementing or limiting any modification to a public or private land-related policy or subsurface mineral right-related policy or practice that is in effect on enactment of this Act relating to the listing of the lesser prairie chicken as a threatened species or endangered species under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.
